alert.note: Alert for Defiance (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern De Kalb and northwestern Defiance Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Joe, or near Hicksville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hicksville around 440 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
